blog.name: rebeltimelord7
blog.title: Werewolves and Tea
blog.description: I'm a bi teenage girl who is also a feminist. (I'm not a misandrist though, please don't confuse the two.). I have depression. I tend to complain about stuff a lot. I'm in multiple fandoms. I have a huge sweet tooth. I'm also very shy when talking to people. I don't have many friends and I tend to fight with them.

summary: I'm going to start taking drawing requests for different species of Trolls (from Trollhunters) with Hogwarts house colours. If...
body:
I’m going to start taking drawing requests for different species of Trolls (from Trollhunters) with Hogwarts house colours. If you don’t know the characters species, say (characters name)s species and (Hogwarts house)


I will also do goblins and fanon species as long as you describe it in some way


You should probably be specific about gender and you can be specific if you want them to wear a dress or a tie or anything like that

And age; old? Young? Whelp? Teen? You decide! =)


I’m doing this because I want to draw something and I don’t know what


They will be traditionally drawn as I’m used to drawing that way

(I’m sorry if you don’t like my art style, I’m still trying to figure it out)

blog.name: madmagic-comic
blog.description:
Kicked out of the Academy of Magic as a teenager before she could finish her studies in witchcraft, Joy Kaplan is a talentless mess, living a life of expedients in the normal world. Although, the place she choose to live in, is pretty far from normal... 
Updates every TUESDAY & THURSDAY

SUPPORT buy a BOOK:
https://gumroad.com/illuminated

summary: I had a dream that Harry Potter was Hogwarts best swimmer and he won the big swim meet. But then Luna Lovegood died and...
body: I had a dream that Harry Potter was Hogwarts best swimmer and he won the big swim meet. But then Luna Lovegood died and Mcgonnagal and Harry had to fight to recover her body from a bunch of mermaids in a stone temple.

reblog.comment: I had a dream that Harry Potter was Hogwarts best swimmer and he won the big swim meet. But then Luna Lovegood died and Mcgonnagal and Harry had to fight to recover her body from a bunch of mermaids in a stone temple.

summary: 🎉 celebratory 200-follower moodboards! 🎉
title: 🎉 celebratory 200-follower moodboards! 🎉
body:
in honour of there being 200 of you here (!!!!!!) i’m doing a little celebration and taking moodboard requests! i’m really feeling making these edits at the moment, so here we go!

  • i wanna know who i’m making these for, so you must be following me (tori) and i won’t be accepting anons for this one, sorry!
  • i’d love it if you could reblog this post to signal boost it!
  • send me through anything to do with the harry potter universe! it can be a character, ship, class, school, book, movie or anything you can think of!
  • this will all be tagged with #asktonksboards if you either want to check out all the creations or block the tags!

and that’s it! thank you so much for following me, i love you all and i look forward to making these moodboards for you lovely followers!

tags: send me a message if you wanna get involved
summary: BOOK LOVERS, LISTEN UP;
title: BOOK LOVERS, LISTEN UP;
body:
I’m looking for people to participate in a huge book exchange. You can be anywhere in the world. All you have to do is buy your favourite book (just one) and send it to a stranger (I’ll send their details through in a private message).

You’ll receive a roughly maximum of 36 books back to you, to keep. They’ll be favourite books from strangers around the world!

If you are interested in taking part, please message me and I’ll send you all the details!

(note: I did not start this project, but I’m participating and would love it if some of ya’ll joined me! 👾)

reblog.comment:

summary: Harry: What are you gonna do? Curse me? Hadrian: Merlin, grant me patience. Hadrian: Because if you give me strength. Hadrian:...
body:

Hadrian: Merlin, grant me patience.

Hadrian: Because if you give me strength.

Hadrian: I’ll smash his head against this wall.

blog.name: maraudertexts
blog.title: Marauders Era Texts
blog.description: A bunch of texts, facebook posts and whatsapp messages keep getting screenshotted and put online for the world to see.

summary: What the heck reg? Leave the lad alone for a bit (aka Barty)
question: What the heck reg? Leave the lad alone for a bit (aka Barty)
answer:
Regulus: Do you think it’s too soon to hang out with him?  I just assumed because we were doing fine when we were stuck together that we’d be fine when we weren’t stuck together…

Regulus: Oh god, maybe you’re right.  I should probably just tell him it’s not a good idea.  *Sighs*

reblog.comment:
Regulus: Do you think it’s too soon to hang out with him?  I just assumed because we were doing fine when we were stuck together that we’d be fine when we weren’t stuck together…

Regulus: Oh god, maybe you’re right.  I should probably just tell him it’s not a good idea.  *Sighs*

summary: Favorite AVPM/S Quotes and Songs
body:
Favorite AVPM/S Quotes and Songs

“What the hell is a Hufflepuff?”

“Did somebody say Draco Malfoy!?”

“Okay, just, stop with the dark king stuff okay? I watch you wipe your butt on a daily basis, you can call me Voldemort, we’re there. We’ve reached that point.”

Granger Danger

“Quirrel, we’re gonna get you laid.”

“Muggles have their place. Mudbloods have their place. And so. Do. Your. Clothes! Namely, a dresser!”

Different As Can Be

To Dance Again

“Harry look, I FOUND something!”

“*GASPP* It’s-uh my daddy!!! you came to love me!!”

Literally every time Draco has been on stage ever

“I am not homeless… Anymore.”

“I WANT HERMIONE GRANGER! and a rocket ship..”

It’s Not Over Yet

Guys Like Potter

I’m sure theres more but it’s late and yea

blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

summary: The Tale of Padfoot and Moony (as told by Prongs)
title: The Tale of Padfoot and Moony (as told by Prongs)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LxSLMo

by Blood_under_my_finger_tips

//This is the tale of Padfoot and Moony, my brothers in mischief and mayhem, my partners in crime and whatever and how I realised they were meant for each other.\

How James tired to get his two best friends to admit they loved each other and was too late. With some betting on the down low and losing to his ‘Lilykins’

Words: 1724, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - Fandom
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M, F/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, James Potter, Lily Evans
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans
  • Additional Tags: another work written when I couldn’t sleep, You’re Welcome, cute little fluff, narration


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LxSLMo

summary: Barty, Maybe you should see if hagrid likes star wars? He would love to meet leaf too!
question: Barty, Maybe you should see if hagrid likes star wars? He would love to meet leaf too!
answer: Barty: No, I can’t.  I’m scared of Hagrid.

reblog.comment: Barty: No, I can’t.  I’m scared of Hagrid.

blog.name: incorrect-marauders

summary:
Sirius: Thank you all for being here, let's get started.
Lily: Wow. Great attitude, Sirius!
Sirius: Excuse me, I was talking to...
body:
Sirius: Thank you all for being here, let's get started.
Lily: Wow. Great attitude, Sirius!
Sirius: Excuse me, I was talking to these ribs.

dialogue.label: Sirius:
dialogue.phrase: Thank you all for being here, let's get started.

dialogue.name: Sirius
dialogue.label: Sirius:

summary: The Tale of Padfoot and Moony (as told by Prongs)
title: The Tale of Padfoot and Moony (as told by Prongs)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LxSLMo

by Blood_under_my_finger_tips

//This is the tale of Padfoot and Moony, my brothers in mischief and mayhem, my partners in crime and whatever and how I realised they were meant for each other.\

How James tired to get his two best friends to admit they loved each other and was too late. With some betting on the down low and losing to his ‘Lilykins’

Words: 1724, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - Fandom
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M, F/M
  • Characters: Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, James Potter, Lily Evans
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans
  • Additional Tags: another work written when I couldn’t sleep, You’re Welcome, cute little fluff, narration


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LxSLMo
